data.Name: Zelcash website
data.Description: Hlavní stránka Zelcash, kde je možné najít veškeré informace ohledně Zelcash, plány, projekty, tým a mnoho dalšího.

data.Name: Zelcash Infopage
data.Description: Zelcash infopage se snaží poskytnout veškeré informace ohledně aktivit Zel Technologies a přinést je uživatelům v co nejvíce komfortní podobě.

data.Name: Zelcash WebWallet
data.Description: WebWallet je jednoduchá Zelcash peněženka. Není potřeba stahovat žádné soboury, jednoduše vytvořte a použivejte svoji peněženku ve vašem oblíbeném prohlížeči zadáním tajné fráze.

data.Name: ZelTreZ
data.Description: ZelTreZ website is dedicated to ZelTreZ and only ZelTreZ itself offering all information about the platform on one place. User can also download the platform on that site, read about it, find a support or ask to list new coins to ZelTreZ platform.

data.Name: Zelcash explorer
data.Description: Main Zelcash explorer showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin insight explorer, offering a powerfull API.

data.Name: Zelcash explorer 2
data.Description: Backup Zelcash explorer showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin insight explorer, offering a powerfull API.

data.Name: Zelcash explorer 3
data.Description: Backup Zelcash explorer 2 showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin insight explorer, offering a powerfull API.

data.Name: Zelcash explorer for ZelTreZ
data.Description: Zelcash explorer used in ZelTreZ platform showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin insight explorer, offering a powerfull API.

data.Name: Zelcash rates
data.Description: Main Zelcash rates API showing Zelcash price in BTC and about 150 fiat currencies. Feel free to pull data from it for your site!

data.Name: Zelcash rates for ZelTreZ
data.Description: Zelcash rates server used inside ZelTreZ. API shows Zelcash price in BTC and about 150 fiat currencies. Feel free to pull data from it for your site!

data.Name: Main BWS
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerfull extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels

data.Name: Backup BWS
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerfull extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels

data.Name: Backup BWS 2
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerfull extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels

data.Name: Backup BWS 3
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerfull extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels
